verbs.description: [ARG0: The presence of President Donald Trump ’s personal attorney Emmet Flood at Thursday afternoon ’s classified hearing with the Dept . of Justice and select members of Congress] [V: left] [ARG1: many on Capitol Hill] [ARG2: scratching their heads] .

The presence of President Donald Trump ’s personal attorney Emmet Flood at Thursday afternoon ’s classified hearing with the Dept . of Justice and select members of Congress left [ARG0: many on Capitol Hill] [V: scratching] [ARG1: their heads] .
